data.text: The "reality" of "Life of Pi" makes "Funny Games" look like a Pixar movie.

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: The problem with "Life of Pi" is that it's a lie. It's about lying. And if the "real" movie played out it would be a Michael Haneke film...

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: Life of Pi: yes, I believe we are the tiger. But I identified more strongly with the zebra.

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: I skimmed the unreadable book but Ang Lee's miraculous film convinced me that "Life of Pi" is actually about how we try to process horror.

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: The "Life of Pi" reveal is either totally bogusly horrible and life-denining or spiritually and creatively the way we process things. Ideas?

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: Silver Linings Playbook is the best movie of 2012.

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: If you've never read a novel pick up "Anna Karenina" and you will have the most intensely jolting and cinematic experience ever. Great book.

data.name: BretEastonEllis
data.text: Lincoln: The gassiest team of the year--Spielberg, Kushner, Day-Lewis, John Williams--all upended by Sally Field's greatness. This happened.
